Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at an exceptional price of $9500. This special offer is designed to recognize your interest and commitment, allowing you to secure a significant saving compared to the standard retail price. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to enhance your experience with our product. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Warm regards, Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
